rate anagathaya pilibandawa sithamin janathawa katayuthu karanawa.mewara ji.es.pi. badu sahanaya nolabewi yayi angalum karuwange biyak pathiremin pawathinawa.mita pera awastha dekakadima ji.es.pi. sahanaya nawathawi yayi wishala kathabahak athiwuna.pera apara dediga jathin wishala piris apa ha athwal bandagena sitina bawata, pasugiya manawa himikam komisama menma, janadhipathithumanta wides nayakayan dakwana mithrathwaya nisama thahawuru wanawa. ji.es.pi. sahanaya da ee anuwa labewi yayi mama wishwasa karanawa.tharuna amathiwarayaku lesa tharunyayata samagami wishaya pathayak obata himiwi thibenne?nipunatha sanwardhana, karmika puhunu wishaya kshethraya ithamath pulul wishayak.karmikawa diyunuwana lowa boho ratawal mema wishayata mulika sthanaya di thibenawa.nidahas adhyapana awastha samatama thibiya yuthu sema, karmika gnyanaya apa wani ratawala daruwanta balabadima ithamath prayojanayi.eeta hethuwa karmika danuma ikmanin ukahaganime buddhiyak gharmakalapiya minisnuta uruma wi athi bawata da matha palawi thibimayi.
